channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Federal judge rules cuts to humanities grants were 'unlawful'

item.title: Trump’s Deals With Top Colleges May Give Rich Applicants a Bigger Edge
item.description: The public release of data on test scores and race could wind up making wealth even more influential in admissions.

item.title: Trump's higher tariffs take effect today. And, a sergeant opened fire at Fort Stewart

item.title: Cornyn Says F.B.I. Will Help Find Texas Lawmakers Who Left State
item.description: The senator said the agency had agreed to help locate Democratic state legislators who departed to try to block a vote on congressional maps. Democrat...

item.title: D.N.C. Pledges $1.5 Million to New Jersey Governor’s Race

item.title: Perito Moreno Glacier Is Thinning Faster Than Expected, Study Shows
item.description: After holding steady for decades, the beloved Perito Moreno has thinned considerably since 2019, scientists said.

item.title: Here’s What France’s Largest Wildfire in Decades Looks Like
item.description: Prime Minister François Bayrou described the nearly 40,000-acre fire, which has killed one person, as a “catastrophe on an unprecedented scale.”
